title: My Calendar's Filling Up Fast—Here's Where I'm Shopping for Every Summer Event
author: Anneliese Henderson
excerpt: Our associate shopping director Judith Jones styles three dresses from Old Navy's Occasion Collection.
text: I love getting invited out. My bank account, on the other hand? It certainly does not love when I RSVP "yes" to every event. (I can almost feel the side-eye when I open my banking app.) It seems like every time I accept a new invitation—be it a bridal shower, a weekend getaway with friends, or a birthday celebration—I need to buy a new outfit. It adds up quickly. And to top it off, I live in New York, so my closet space can't really keep up. But what can I say? I'm a fashion editor who loves pretty things. Enter my little secret: Old Navy's Occasion collection. The second I saw its stunning selection of formal dresses, I knew this collection would be my go-to for outfits this season. Not only are all the dresses under $100, but they're all so versatile, making them easy to wear for so many different scenarios. My wallet and wardrobe couldn't be happier.The collection was also a no-brainer for my coworker, associate shopping director Judith Jones. As a mom of two with a busy social schedule, she was on the hunt for a one-stop shop of chic pieces she could wear to all her events this summer. She took a few dresses from Old Navy for a spin and styled them to perfection. Shop Judith's summer event outfits—from on-trend polka-dot maxis to twirl-worthy mini dresses—below."This navy polka-dot dress is a wedding-season essential, IMO. It's ideal for semi-formal indoor or outdoor events and will effortlessly transition you from day to night. The dress has the most beautiful silhouette, featuring minimalist spaghetti straps and a gorgeous cowl neck that's giving elegant '90s vibes. The back is just as alluringly captivating as the front, with a super chic tie detail. The body-skimming satin fabric in a maxi silhouette makes it look particularly elegant for a special occasion such as a wedding. I love how timeless and upscale the polka-dot print feels— it's something that never goes out of style. Priced at just $55, you really can't beat it." — Judith Jones, associate shopping director The Occasion by Old Navy Satin Cowl Maxi Dress "I absolutely love this dress for a fun birthday party, but it could be worn for a number of occasions—it's flirty and so playful! A true joy to wear. The fit-and-flare silhouette is extremely flattering, and the mini length feels modern and chic, which makes it perfect for a birthday party or dinner. I absolutely love a dress with pockets, so this one already won me over from the get-go. The party-ready taffeta fabric is crisp, smooth, and holds its shape, and the tie straps add a charming detail. For the perfect fit, Old Navy added a game-changing side smocking. Warning: This will make you want to dance and twirl all night long! I styled the dress with simple black strappy heels and silver accessories—you really don't need too much to let this dress shine." — Jones The Occasion by Old Navy Fit & Flare Taffeta Cami Mini Dress "The perfect vacation dress? Found. There are so many things I love about this dress, but first and foremost, I just love the way it makes me feel: Confident, pretty, and comfortable. I'm a big fan of the gorgeous, silky-soft fabric—it's incredibly comfortable and looks seriously chic. The print and ruffle-sleeve detail are feminine and pretty, plus the deep V is incredibly flattering. The best part? The dress has a center-back elastic for extra comfort. This dress is so easy to dress up or down. It will look just as chic with flat sandals as it does dressed up with heels. I'm obsessed!" — Jones The Occasion by Old Navy Flutter-Sleeve Satin Maxi Dress
html:
I love getting invited out. My bank account, on the other hand? It certainly does not love when I RSVP "yes" to every event. (I can almost feel the side-eye when I open my banking app.) It seems like every time I accept a new invitation—be it a bridal shower, a weekend getaway with friends, or a birthday celebration—I need to buy a new outfit. It adds up quickly. And to top it off, I live in New York, so my closet space can't really keep up. But what can I say? I'm a fashion editor who loves pretty things. Enter my little secret: Old Navy's Occasion collection. The second I saw its stunning selection of formal dresses, I knew this collection would be my go-to for outfits this season. Not only are all the dresses under $100, but they're all so versatile, making them easy to wear for so many different scenarios. My wallet and wardrobe couldn't be happier.

The collection was also a no-brainer for my coworker, associate shopping director Judith Jones. As a mom of two with a busy social schedule, she was on the hunt for a one-stop shop of chic pieces she could wear to all her events this summer. She took a few dresses from Old Navy for a spin and styled them to perfection. Shop Judith's summer event outfits—from on-trend polka-dot maxis to twirl-worthy mini dresses—below.

"This navy polka-dot dress is a wedding-season essential, IMO. It's ideal for semi-formal indoor or outdoor events and will effortlessly transition you from day to night. The dress has the most beautiful silhouette, featuring minimalist spaghetti straps and a gorgeous cowl neck that's giving elegant '90s vibes. The back is just as alluringly captivating as the front, with a super chic tie detail. The body-skimming satin fabric in a maxi silhouette makes it look particularly elegant for a special occasion such as a wedding. I love how timeless and upscale the polka-dot print feels— it's something that never goes out of style. Priced at just $55, you really can't beat it." — Judith Jones, associate shopping director

The Occasion by Old Navy

Satin Cowl Maxi Dress

"I absolutely love this dress for a fun birthday party, but it could be worn for a number of occasions—it's flirty and so playful! A true joy to wear. The fit-and-flare silhouette is extremely flattering, and the mini length feels modern and chic, which makes it perfect for a birthday party or dinner. I absolutely love a dress with pockets, so this one already won me over from the get-go. The party-ready taffeta fabric is crisp, smooth, and holds its shape, and the tie straps add a charming detail. For the perfect fit, Old Navy added a game-changing side smocking. Warning: This will make you want to dance and twirl all night long! I styled the dress with simple black strappy heels and silver accessories—you really don't need too much to let this dress shine." — Jones

The Occasion by Old Navy

Fit & Flare Taffeta Cami Mini Dress

"The perfect vacation dress? Found. There are so many things I love about this dress, but first and foremost, I just love the way it makes me feel: Confident, pretty, and comfortable. I'm a big fan of the gorgeous, silky-soft fabric—it's incredibly comfortable and looks seriously chic. The print and ruffle-sleeve detail are feminine and pretty, plus the deep V is incredibly flattering. The best part? The dress has a center-back elastic for extra comfort. This dress is so easy to dress up or down. It will look just as chic with flat sandals as it does dressed up with heels. I'm obsessed!" — Jones

The Occasion by Old Navy

Flutter-Sleeve Satin Maxi Dress
